attributes.action: Help X offenders Start a business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the priminster to make a program for people like my self start a business in a trade they are able to do to keep them of the streets im trying to start a tattoo shop and if i had the funding i would not do crime again becouse id have my life long dream of been a tattooist wich ive been doing for ten years and i want to stop braking the law to do this i need a liscence but cant afford one to set up so i have to brake the law sign so we can get help if we need it
